name: grisynik tower defense
description:
Protect the siege ram from the ghostly bee bugs by building towers, but beware: your ram moves forward and will soon leave its guarding towers behind.

We wanted to try rust for game development, so this was mostly at technical experiment. We used kiss3d as render backend with some custom changes.

Don't have high expectations: balance is horribly off and loosing is nearly impossible. Also there are no real game decisions to make.

Windows version seems to have a bug and doesn't show life or credits .
